name: ADX Strong Trend
description: ADX > 25 trend strength filter with EMA direction
rationale: ADX measures trend STRENGTH, not direction. ADX > 25 indicates a strong trend is in place - this filters out choppy, sideways markets where momentum strategies fail. Combined with EMA crossover for direction, we only trade when: (1) a trend exists (ADX > 25), AND (2) the trend is turning bullish (fast EMA crosses above slow). This should reduce whipsaws in ranging markets. Previous ADX strategies failed because they were too restrictive - this uses ADX as a filter, not the primary signal.
